description: Turkey says it is no longer preventing Syrians from leaving for Europe - and the refugees want to move.
title: Syria war: Refugees eye Europe as Turkey hits breaking point
title_page: Syria war: Refugees eye Europe as Turkey hits breaking point - BBC News
maintext: "We send about two or three boats a day when the sea is calm," he tells us. "We're not being watched as much at the moment," he says. "It's not as risky to cross."
